fields.name: feed_publisher_name
fields.description: Full name of the organization that publishes the feed

fields.name: feed_publisher_url
fields.description: URL of the feed publisher's website

fields.name: feed_lang
fields.description: Primary language used in the feed

fields.name: feed_start_date
fields.description: Start date for the feed validity period

fields.name: feed_end_date
fields.description: End date for the feed validity period

fields.name: feed_hash
fields.description: Hash of the GTFS feed for data lineage

description: Feed metadata and publisher information from GTFS schedule feeds
